typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		name as string,
		rating as string,
		genre as string,
		year as integer,
		released as string,
		score as double,
		votes as double,
		director as string,
		writer as string,
		star as string,
		country as string,
		budget as double,
		gross as double,
		company as string,
		runtime as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(year>=1990) ~> Filtrar1
Filtrar1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		name,
		rating,
		genre
	)) ~> sink1
Filtrar1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		name as string,
		rating as string,
		genre as string,
		year as string,
		released as string,
		score as string,
		votes as string,
		director as string,
		writer as string,
		star as string,
		country as string,
		budget as string,
		gross as string,
		company as string,
		runtime as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
